sentences.en: Cai Wei once sold cigarettes and worked as pedicab driver.
sentences.cn: 蔡伟卖过香烟、冰棍,也当过三轮车夫.

sentences.en: Even pedicab drivers were carrying tea samples and looking for clients on the street.
sentences.cn: 甚至连三轮车司机都带着样品茶,在街上四处寻找买主.

sentences.en: He is an industrious pedicab driver.
In our alley alone, there are three pedicab riders.
sentences.cn: 单单我们这条小巷就有三辆.

sentences.en: When unemployed, I went to drive a pedicab.
sentences.cn: 我失业的时候就去蹬三轮车.

trans.tran_en: a pedal-operated tricycle, available for hire, with an attached seat for one or two passengers
